iep_goals: Demonstrate appropriate classroom behavior and follow school rules with 90% compliance
Use conflict resolution strategies instead of aggressive responses in 8 out of 10 opportunities
accommodations: Structured behavior support plan with clear expectations
Access to calm-down space and coping strategies
Modified consequences focused on restorative practices
learning_styles: responds well to clear structure and consistent routines
benefits from choice-making opportunities within limits

interviews.parent: Parent reports Kai is intelligent but struggles with authority and has difficulty managing frustration appropriately.
interviews.teacher: Kai can be charming and insightful but needs consistent boundaries and support to maintain appropriate behavior.

observations.psychologist: Average intellectual functioning with significant challenges in emotional regulation and social interaction. Benefits from structured therapeutic approaches.
